Watchtower AI | Data Science, Backend, Systems, Full-stack Engineers | San Francisco & Palo Alto | ONSITE, REMOTE Welcome | https://www.watchtower.ai

Watchtower is a data security startup dedicated to helping enterprises discover, classify, and protect sensitive data across their cloud footprint - their corporate SaaS, data infrastructure, and APIs - via machine learning.

⁃ We’re looking for folks passionate about working at the intersection of deep learning, information security, and distributed systems. ⁃ Tech Stack: Go, Node.js, React, Python, Cassandra, Redis, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes. ⁃ Well funded by top-tier VC investors who have invested in, operated at, taken public/exited major cybersecurity & SaaS companies.

Apply & view detailed roles here: https://www.watchtower.ai/careers

We would love to hear from you - please reach out to us at careers@watchtower.ai with any questions you may have.
